title: What is the process for achieving "Vivificazione" through "Segni" and "Prese"?
first_phrase: This text describes a series of exercises practiced for spiritual enlightenment. The practitioner repeatedly performs preparatory exercises over seven days before moving on to form the sign "I" and other gestures, each with its corresponding animating syllable. After the completion of the third cycle, which lasts for several months, the disciple is said to enter a new phase and receives a secret name. The final paragraph discusses this new phase and the various cycles involved in achieving spiritual enlightenment.
content: Dopo i primi quattro giorni, portando come sopra l'indice in contatto con la lingua dovrebbesi avvertire un sapore di sale. Allora e tempo di acuire lo sguardo e nel momento in cui il discepolo scorgerà un'ombra nera, questa parte del lavoro è esaurita. A tal punto comincia per il discepolo una nuova vita ed egli riceve, nella loggia, un nome segreto. Segue una nuova fase, di durata varia a seconda degli individui, tuttavia con un minimo di tre mesi lu nari, e comprendente altri tre cicli.
last_phrase: In conclusion, after completing the first phase of the exercise and sensing the taste of salt in contact with the tongue, the disciple should focus on spotting a black shadow, indicating the end of this stage. The disciple then enters a new life, receives a secret name, and starts the next phase, involving three cycles, each with a duration of at least three months. These cycles are completed under the supervision of a Master, who provides instructions and guidance to the disciple on the subsequent work.
